name: Melting Eye - Sneaky Square Colors, Sneaky Color Game, Different Color
name_original: Melting Eye - Sneaky Square Colors, Sneaky Color Game, Different Color
description:
Melting Eye - Find sneaky color and different color with friends.

* Find sneaky color which is darker than other colors. Sneaky color is different color than others.

* Color game is very simple. Click the square which is different than other squares. You have 60 seconds to go!

* Only be careful! If you click wrong square 3 times in total, your point will be reduced by 1. Good Luck !

* You can play RUSH MODE that you can challange with mistakes you make

* You can play ARCADE MODE that you can challange with time that you have only 1 minute to get max point.

* Play Melting Eye FREE now to find sneaky color and different color!

* Find them with friends so that you can earn more points.

* Share your result on facebook with your friends.

* Ads are our income model so that we are glad if you click them :)

* Taorus Dijital is mobile application company where Taorus Dijital develops iOS games and apps for Appstore.
